name: Happy P's Revenge
description:
Happy P is sick of those flies, and he's not going to take it any more.

Secret Pudding scientists have built a new Fly Smasher, and we'd like you to test it!

Tilt your phone to bounce around the testing arena and pound as many flies as you can with Happy P's new toy.

FOR HAPPY P EYES ONLY: Land on flies from above or they'll still get you!!!
